```{r setup, include=F}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = F, message = F, warning = F)

# libraries
library(flexdashboard)
library(tidyverse)
library(shiny)
library(patchwork)
library(stargazer)

source('R/funcs.R')

# data
load(url('https://tbep-tech.github.io/piney-point/data/lobodat.RData'))

# log
log <- readLines('https://tbep-tech.github.io/piney-point/lobolog.txt')

# variables to select
vrs <- list(
  `Salinity (psu)` = 'sal', 
  `Temp (C)` = 'temp', 
  `CO2 (ppm)` = 'co2', 
  `DO (mg/L)` = 'do', 
  `pH` = 'ph',
  `PAR (um/m2/s)` = 'par',
  `Pressure (dbar)` = 'press'
)

# date range on input data
dtrng <- range(lobodat$datetime) %>% 
  as.Date
```

```{r reactives}
# data selection
datsel <- reactive({
  
  # inputs
  varsel1 <- input$varsel1
  varsel2 <- input$varsel2
  dtsel <- input$dtsel
  
  out <- lobodat %>% 
    select(datetime, !!varsel1, !!varsel2) %>% 
    filter(as.Date(datetime) >= dtsel[1] & as.Date(datetime) <= dtsel[2])

  return(out)
  
})

# time series and scatter plot
tsplo <- reactive({
  
  # inputs
  varsel1 <- input$varsel1
  varsel2 <- input$varsel2
  datsel <- datsel()
  
  lb1 <- names(vrs)[which(unlist(vrs) == varsel1)]
  lb2 <- names(vrs)[which(unlist(vrs) == varsel2)]
    
  p1 <- ggplot(datsel, aes_string(x = 'datetime', y = varsel1)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_point() + 
    theme_minimal(base_size = 16) + 
    labs(y = lb1) + 
    theme(
      axis.title.x = element_blank()
    )
  
  p2 <- ggplot(datsel, aes_string(x = 'datetime', y = varsel2)) + 
    geom_line() + 
    geom_point() + 
    theme_minimal(base_size = 16) + 
    labs(y = lb2) + 
    theme(
      axis.title.x = element_blank()
    )
  
  p3 <- ggplot(datsel, aes_string(x = varsel1, y = varsel2))+ 
    geom_point()+ 
    theme_minimal(base_size = 16) + 
    labs(x = lb1, y = lb2) + 
    geom_smooth(method = 'lm')
  
  p <- (p1 / p2) | p3
  
  return(p)
  
})

# linear mod
lmstat <- reactive({
  
  # inputs
  varsel1 <- input$varsel1
  varsel2 <- input$varsel2
  datsel <- datsel()

  frm <- paste(varsel2, varsel1, sep = '~') %>% 
    as.formula
  
  out <- lm(frm, datsel)
  
  return(out)
  
})

# pearson
corstat <- reactive({
 
  # inputs
  varsel1 <- input$varsel1
  varsel2 <- input$varsel2
  datsel <- datsel()

  corv <- cor.test(datsel[[varsel1]], datsel[[varsel2]])
  
  out <- paste0('r = ', round(corv$estimate, 2), ', p ', format.pval(corv$p.value))
  
  return(out) 
  
})

output$lmstat <- renderText(stargazer(lmstat(), type = 'html', digits = 2))
output$corstat <- renderText(corstat())

```
